title: Bluetooth speaker not visible for pairing with Pixel 4a
content:
I am trying to pair my new Pixel 4a to Geneva S Bluetooth speaker. I can detect and pair to the speaker using an iphone and an old android 6 device but not using the 4a. I can pair to other BT devices with the 4a (it takes a couple of attempts with some devices). It feels like a BT compatibility problem but BT is supposed to be backwards compatible. 
A Bluetooth scanner on the old android device says the Geneva speaker is using Classic BR/EDR protocol.
I'd really appreciate any suggestions for how to fix this. The speaker cost more than the phone so I'd something has to go it will be the phone unfortunately!
